long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension help you one-click to create new episode for your podcast based on your viewing youtube video.

Just create your own podcast in https://YoutubePod.com and subscribe it  in your mobile, where iPhone can use Apple Podcast App, Android can use Google Podcast.

Then goto youtube video page, and open this extension, click "Add to Episode", then you can listen it in you podcast!

Enjoy!
